title: VRExpress
author: VRExpress
content: What the heck is sleep wellness doing on the blockchain? Some developers are just pieces of shit themselves, they are trying and trying to find ways that they can milk the best milk out of everyone before the bull cycle is completely over, please look into this project and tell me what you feel.https://sleepfuture.com

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: Not going to click the link, but to be honest, this could be just another pump and dump project, or this could be successful one.Anyhow, I same let's give them the benefit of the doubt. If they have a good use case then why not though. But I do hope that they will offer something unique not a project that will just milk the whole crypto space as you have mentioned.

comments.author: masterrex
comments.body: Quote from: VRExpress on May 08, 2022, 07:35:02 AMWhat the heck is sleep wellness doing on the blockchain? Some developers are just pieces of shit themselves, they are trying and trying to find ways that they can milk the best milk out of everyone before the bull cycle is completely over, please look into this project and tell me what you feel.https://sleepfuture.com I think the link is safe but for me, it is not interesting, because what the hell is sleep wellness doing on crypto, it's not appropriate to do it in crypto because it is a medical concern, what is it? are they monetizing the sleep disorders or sleep problems correct me if im wrong but if someone has a problem with sleeping or they have sleeping disorders they should seek a professional from a doctor and not on any project on crypto, Anyway just my opinion!

comments.author: $anounimus$
comments.body: In my view Need to be studied in more detail before investing, there is no guarantee that a project will be successful, or that someone will use the token. But personally, for me, I think it's worth investing some money and time in a project that has Functions and products, and fundamentals because if it goes well, everyone will get a percentage of the profits.
